div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

Questions can be directed to the staff listed on each activity.

p.strong: Please see below for an important address from Superintendent Dr. Schilling. Governor Pritzker has announced that all Illinois schools will remain closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year.

strong.a: Video Address from Superintendent Dr. Schilling

p.strong: District 158's Remote Learning Plan will remain in place through the end of the school year on Wednesday, June 3. Home Learning Activities, grab-and-go-meals, and other supports will continue to be provided to families. Please email the principal of your child's school with any questions. More information will be shared soon. Keep calm, carry on, and continue to prioritize the health and safety of your loved ones at all times.
